tool_description: you can translate all from any langue source, and this is unlimited
name: Google translation unlimited
title: Google translation unlimited

api_list.name: Support Language
api_list.description: Here is language list support of this API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://google-translation-unlimited.p.rapidapi.com/get_languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-translation-unlimited.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://google-translation-unlimited.p.rapidapi.com/get_languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "google-translation-unlimited.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
